sentence: Conor Lamb is accusing rival John Fetterman in Pennsylvania's Democratic U.S. Senate primary of skipping candidate forums to avoid talking about a 2013 incident when shotgun in hand, he confronted a Black man because he suspected the man was involved in gunfire nearby.
author: Via AP news wire
title: Lamb revives gun incident to attack Fetterman in Senate race

author: Jason Easley
title: Conor Lamb Gets Ugly On John Fetterman In PA Democratic Senate Primary

sentence: By MARC LEVY, Associated Press Conor Lamb is accusing rival John Fetterman in Pennsylvania’s Democratic U.S. Senate primary of skipping candidate forums to avoid talking about a 2013 incident when, shotgun in hand, he confronted a Black man because he suspected the man was involved in gunfire nearby.
author: Associated Press
title: Lamb revives gun incident to attack Fetterman in Senate race

sentence: Jonathan Tamari: Let’s start with John Fetterman, who the lieutenant governor and, by all accounts, the significant front-runner at this point.
author: Mary Harris
title: The Senate Race That Could Decide Democrats’ Future

sentence: Perhaps the longest and sharpest exchange came over a question about a 2013 incident when, shotgun in hand, John Fetterman confronted someone who he believed to be involved with gunfire on a nearby street in Braddock, where Fetterman was mayor.
author: WKOK Staff
title: PA Headlines: Dem US Senate Debate: Fetterman, Kenyatta, Lamb

author: Julian Routh
title: Front-runner Fetterman defends his platform, 2013 Braddock incident in Democratic U.S. Senate debate

author: Julian Routh
title: Fetterman defends platform, 2013 Braddock incident in fiery Democratic U.S. Senate debate
